articles.title: PH still at 'very low risk' for Covid-19 amid rise in infections in other Asian countries — OCTA - Manila Bulletin
articles.content:
The Philippines remained under very low risk classification for Covid-19 despite the surge in cases in neighboring countries, the independent research group OCTA said on Sunday, March 20.

articles.title: Tourist arrivals breach 100K as PHL remains easiest destination to visit | Ma. Stella F. Arnaldo - BusinessMirror
